N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 46.3 - Use

State Regulations
(a) Such signs
shall be displayed and such flashing red signal lamps shall be used only when
the vehicle is engaged exclusively in the transportation of pupils, teachers
and other persons acting in a supervisory capacity to and from school or school
activities. When the vehicle is not so engaged, such signs must be covered or
removed. Such signs and lamps shall not be displayed or used when the vehicle
is engaged in charter operations not related to school or school
activities. (b) For the purpose of
this section, the term school activities shall be defined as "any program for
the benefit of pupils, sponsored and supervised by school officials," and shall
include, but shall not be limited to, such activities as the following, when so
supervised and sponsored: (1)
extracurricular
activities such as athletics, dramatics, and musicals; (2)
field trips directly connected with
subjects included in the school curriculum; and
(3)
school dances and other similar
activities. Notes
